Merge #11307

11307: fix: Allow macros to expand to or-patterns r=jonas-schievink a=jonas-schievink

Fixes https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/11097

Also simplifies the diagnostic slightly.

bors r+
